TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventRecord extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class EventRecord Implements IDisposable
public ref class EventRecord abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: Defines the properties of an event instance for an event that is received from an object.

span.span: Defines the properties of an event instance for an event that is received from an object.

summary.span: The event properties provide information about the event such as the name of the computer where the event was logged and the time the event was created.

span.span: The event properties provide information about the event such as the name of the computer where the event was logged and the time the event was created.

summary.span: This class is an abstract class.

span.span: This class is an abstract class.

summary.span: The class implements this class.

span.span: The class implements this class.

remarks.format: ## Examples Por exemplo de código usando essa classe, consulte [How To: consulta de eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5231a436-4cf2-4539-90d2-a04813aba069) ou [How To: acesso e informações de evento de leitura](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14db3375-d305-49ae-aa24-aedbe906e76c).For example code using this class, see [How To: Query for Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5231a436-4cf2-4539-90d2-a04813aba069) or [How To: Access and Read Event Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14db3375-d305-49ae-aa24-aedbe906e76c).

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Id As Integer
public: abstract property int Id { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the identifier for this event.

span.span: Gets the identifier for this event.

summary.span: All events with this identifier value represent the same type of event.

span.span: All events with this identifier value represent the same type of event.
Returns an integer value.
This value can be null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Keywords As Nullable(Of Long)
public: abstract property Nullable<long> Keywords { Nullable<long> get(); };

summary.span: Gets the keyword mask of the event.

span.span: Gets the keyword mask of the event.

summary.span: Get the value of the property to get the name of the keywords used in this mask.

span.span: Get the value of the property to get the name of the keywords used in this mask.
Returns a long value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As palavras-chave para um evento são usadas para agrupar os eventos com outros eventos semelhantes com base no uso dos eventos.The keywords for an event are used to group the event with other similar events based on the usage of the events. Cada palavra-chave é um bit em uma máscara de 64 bits.Each keyword is a bit in a 64-bit mask. Valores de bit predefinidos e bits reservados ocupam as posições superior 16 dessa máscara, deixando o manifesto para usar todos os bits entre 0x0000000000000001 e 0x0000800000000000.Predefined bit values and reserved bits occupy the top 16 positions of this mask, leaving the manifest to use any bits between 0x0000000000000001 and 0x0000800000000000. As palavras-chave do evento padrão são definidas na enumeração.The standard event keywords are defined in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property KeywordsDisplayNames As IEnumerable(Of String)

summary.span: Gets the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

span.span: Gets the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

value.span: Retorna uma coleção enumerável de cadeias de caracteres que contêm os nomes de exibição, as palavras-chave usadas na máscara de palavra-chave para este evento.

span.span: Returns an enumerable collection of strings that contain the display names of the keywords used in the keyword mask for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As palavras-chave do evento padrão são definidas na enumeração.The standard event keywords are defined in the enumeration.

span.span: The level signifies the severity of the event.

span.span: Gets the opcode of the event.

summary.span: The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

span.span: The opcode defines a numeric value that identifies the activity or a point within an activity that the application was performing when it raised the event.

Returns a short value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Os opcodes padrão de evento são definidos na enumeração.The standard event opcodes are defined in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RelatedActivityId As Nullable(Of Guid)
public: abstract property Nullable<Guid> RelatedActivityId { Nullable<Guid> get(); };

summary.span: Gets a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a related activity in a process for which an event is involved.

span.span: Gets a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a related activity in a process for which an event is involved.
Returns a GUID value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Um provedor de eventos pode definir o valor do atributo ActivityID antes de publicar eventos.An event provider can set the value of the ActivityID attribute before publishing events. Todos os eventos que são publicados depois que essa ID é definida terá o atributo ActivityID definido como o valor especificado.All the events that are published after this ID is set will have the ActivityID attribute set to the specified value. Isso permite que os provedores especificar relações simples entre os eventos.This allows providers to specify simple relationships between events. Os eventos que são publicados são parte da mesma atividade.The events that are published are part of the same activity. Quando um provedor deve iniciar uma atividade de novo, mas relacionada, o publicador pode publicar um evento de transferência e especificar a nova ID de atividade.When a provider must start a new, but related activity, the publisher can publish a transfer event and specify the new activity ID. Essa nova ID será exibido como um atributo RelatedActivityID.This new ID will appear as a RelatedActivityID attribute. Isso permite aos consumidores agrupar atividades relacionadas.This allows consumers to group related activities.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Task As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: abstract property Nullable<int> Task { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: Gets a task identifier for a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event.

span.span: Gets a task identifier for a portion of an application or a component that publishes an event.

summary.span: A task is a 16-bit value with 16 top values reserved.

span.span: A task is a 16-bit value with 16 top values reserved.

summary.span: This type allows any value between 0x0000 and 0xffef to be used.

span.span: This type allows any value between 0x0000 and 0xffef to be used.

summary.span: To obtain the task name, get the value of the property.

span.span: To obtain the task name, get the value of the property.
Returns an integer value.
This value can be null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As tarefas de evento padrão são definidas na enumeração.The standard event tasks are defined in the enumeration.

public: abstract property System::String ^ TaskDisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome de exibição da tarefa para o evento.

span.span: Returns a string that contains the display name of the task for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As tarefas de evento padrão são definidas na enumeração.The standard event tasks are defined in the enumeration.
